strapiPost.title: INTERFORM Preparing Month Long Fashion & Art Experience For NWA
strapiPost.content:
INTERFORM will bring fashion and art center stage during June for the inaugural ASSEMBLY, a month-long fashion and art biennial intended to highlight the artists and designers of Northwest Arkansas.

  • The walk: ASSEMBLY will begin at the Momentary with NWA Fashion Week, June 8-10, showcasing regional designers alongside exhibitions from award-winning New York-based artist Firelei BÃ¡ez and an installation from world-renowned textile artist Rachel Hayes.
  • On display: The month-long immersive experience will showcase over 60 artists in over ten exhibitions across Northwest Arkansas and multiple retail pop-up shops featuring local designers' collections alongside nationally recognized brands. 

Reserve tickets for NWA Fashion Week HERE.
